title: The Demon Lord is Busy Chasing His Wife - Novel Updates

author: Qi Muya   祁木伢
description:
“Get down. “The cold, prideful, and lonesome man looked down at the kitty in his arms and was about to remove it.

“Bang! “The cat suddenly transformed into a striking beauty.

A certain man: ”… “

It was precisely because he knew her transformation was unstable that he did not let her close.

In the past life, up till her death, she thought that this man loathed her. Yet in this lifetime, why was he so persistent and clingy?

In the past life, until she was on the brink of death, he hadn’t been able to confess his feelings. This lifetime, he was not going to let her go.>
